means: 唉（表示痛苦，悲伤或悔恨）

sentence.Network_en: All around women wailed their woe or screamed abuse.
sentence.Network_cn: 四下里女人们呼天抢地，高声叫骂。

sentence.Network_en: He was constantly regaled with tales of woe.
sentence.Network_cn: 别人老是给他讲些倒霉事儿来逗他开心。

sentence.Network_en: Woe betide anyone who got in his way.

phrase.cizu_name: woe betide someone (或 woe to someone)

jx.jx_en_mean: used humorously to warn someone that they will be in trouble if they do a specified thing
jx.jx_cn_mean: ( 幽默)某人将要倒霉（或遭殃）

lj.lj_ly: woe betide anyone wearing the wrong colour!.
lj.lj_ls: 穿错颜色的人将要倒霉！。

jx.jx_en_mean: an ironical or humorous exclamation of sorrow or distress

derivation.yuyuan_name: natural exclamation of lament: recorded as wā in Old English and found in several Germanic languages

encyclopedia.content: 音标 woe 英音：[wəu]美音：[wo]中文翻译名词 n. 1. 悲哀；悲痛[U] Mary's life was full of woe. 玛丽的生活充满着悲哀。 2. 困难；灾难；不幸[C][P1] He was faithful to me in weal and woe. 不管是在顺境或是在逆境，他一直对我忠诚。 She told him all her woes. 她向他倾诉全部苦恼。感叹词 int. 1. 锛埍硎就纯啵嘶蚧诤揎級哎哟，唉

example.ex: He listened to my tale of woe...
example.tran: 他听我诉说悲伤的故事。

example.ex: All around women wailed their woe or screamed abuse.
example.tran: 四下里女人们呼天抢地，高声叫骂。

entry.def: You can refer to someone's problems as their woes .

example.ex: He did not tell his relatives and friends about his woes.
example.tran: 他没有告诉亲友自己的烦恼。

auth_sentence.content: The month of Woe-vember will soon be upon them.
auth_sentence.res_content: The month of Woe-vember will soon be upon them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The month of Woe-vember will soon be upon them.

auth_sentence.content: And if, ah woe, she loves alone.
auth_sentence.res_content: And if, ah woe, she loves alone.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: And if, ah woe, she loves alone.

auth_sentence.content: I am great with woe, and shall deliver weeping.
auth_sentence.res_content: I am great with woe, and shall deliver weeping.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I am great with woe, and shall deliver weeping.

means.word_mean: 悲伤;哀愁; 痛苦; 苦恼

sentences.en: She was oppressed by her many woes.
sentences.cn: 她的许多烦恼使她受到压抑。

sentences.en: Kinsman helps kinsman,but woe to him that hath nothing.
sentences.cn: 亲人帮亲人,无亲愁煞人。

means.word_mean: 困境;灾难; 麻烦; 问题; 困难

sentences.en: She has cried the blues about its financial woes.
sentences.cn: 对于经济的困难她叫苦不迭。

sentences.en: A man is well or woe as he thinks himself so.
sentences.cn: 自认祸是祸,自认福是福。

means.word_mean: 某人就要倒霉；灾难将会降临某人身上

sentences.en: Woe betide anyone who arrives late!
